name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience delivering high-performance software solutions, proficient in **Java**, **Spring**, and **REST** APIs. Demonstrated expertise in **MySQL**, **PostgreSQL**, and deploying applications in **AWS** environments. Skilled in using **Docker** for containerization and implementing CI/CD practices to streamline development processes. Strong background in agile methodologies, particularly **Scrum**, and building **SaaS** applications.

In addition, adept at modern technologies including JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, and Flutter, with hands-on expertise across the full stack using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven experience in leading the development of enterprise platforms incorporating AI/ML capabilities for real-time analytics and automation while ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Passionate about building secure and maintainable solutions that drive significant real-world impact.
